I Made a Cute Logo for the Blog!

I love Adobe Illustrator

Posted by Brittny Lapierre on November 14, 2016

Adobe Illustrator Makes Logo Making so Easy!

I'm super happy with my first logo design ever. It's simple but that's exactly why I like it. In case it's not too obvious, it's a cappuccino and the double ampersand (&&) which is used in lots of programming languages as the logical and operator!
